properties.areaDesc: Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Central Chippewa
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:43AM EST until February 18 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches
with locally higher amounts possible near Lake Huron.

* WHERE...Western Chippewa, Central Chippewa, Southeast
Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread into eastern Upper
Michigan this evening and become heavy at times late this
evening and overnight.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST TUESDAY
